name: Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing Set with LED Swings, 2-Person Saucer Swing & 5ft Slide, Outdoor Kids Playset with Safe Design – 12.2' L x 6' W x 5.91' H, 500lbs Max Weight
short_description: OUTDOOR FUN: Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing set is feature packed with a 5ft wavy slide, 2-person saucer swing and 2 motion activated LED double-walled blow-molded swing seats. Up to 5 kids can play at once, (500 lbs maximum weight)
ASSEMBLED DIMENSIONS: Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing set measures 12.2’L x 6’W x 5.91’H
HEAVY DUTY: Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing set is constructed of 2”, heavy duty, powder coated steel frame to prevent rusting
EXTRA COMFORT: Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing set swing chains are covered with vinyl to protect children’s hands; Frame legs are foam-padded for extra safety while playing

SAFE DESIGN: Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing set meets or exceeds all ASTM safety standards; Foam padded legs and PVC covered swing chains are all designed with safety as our number one priority! Age range: 3 to 8 years old
LIFETIME WARRANTY: Limited lifetime warranty on our blow molded slide
product_description: The Sportspower Starlight Metal Swing Set shines bright during the day/evening and will become the highlight of your children’s days. As they swing, the 2-blow molded LED swings will transport them through different galaxies. The adventurous journey continues with the 2-person saucer swing and 5ft wavy slide. This swing set was designed with safety in mind. This will allow your swing set to have extra support and stability, plus help against various playing and weather conditions. All swing chains are covered with safe and sturdy vinyl that protects kids' hands while they play. Our heavy-duty 5ft 1-piece blow-molded slide provides easy assembly unlike the hassles of assembling other competitors’ 3pc slides. Give your kids continuous active fun with the many activities this swing set has to offer! All Sportspower products meet or exceed all ASTM safety standards, so kids and parents can both enjoy the Starlight Metal Swing Set with peace of mind.

product_description: With the Step2 Play Up Gym Set, you can create amazing adventures for your children. This all-in-one outdoor playset provides unlimited hours of entertainment, allowing kids to swing, slide, and climb to their hearts' delight right in your own backyard. This playset is appropriate for children of all ages and is designed to foster social interaction and active play. Whether your children are toddlers or older children, they will have a safe and stimulating environment in which to participate and play, supporting the development of social skills and physical ability. The Step2 Play Up Gym Set has two swings with adjustable ropes that will provide children with hours of swinging fun. Watch as they soar into the air with joy and happiness, reveling in the pure joy that swing sets provide. This playset catches children's attention and inspires their imagination with its vivid and appealing design. The vibrant color palette enables imaginative play and outdoor adventure while stimulating creativity. This playground is made of durable double-walled plastic and is designed to last a long time. You can rely on it to last for years without chipping, fading, cracking, or peeling. The low-maintenance design makes cleaning simple, letting you spend more quality time with your children. Invest in the Step2 Play Up Gym Set to create a backyard hideaway that will give your children limitless fun and great memories. Allow children to express their energy, interact with others, and learn important skills in a fun and safe outdoor setting.

short_description: BUILT FOR OUTDOORS: Made to withstand the weather, this wooden backyard set is pre-treated with a water-based stain that includes UV and mold protection to hold up against the elements.

product_description: The Appleton Swing Set by KidKraft is perfect for small spaces. With a compact footprint of just 80 sq. ft., Appleton packs miles of fun into every well-crafted inch—accommodating up to six lively kids. Starting with an exhilarating high-rail wave slide, the adventure continues with a quick scramble up the rock wall ladder to the shade of the gable-roofed upper deck. There, enclosed by protective side slats, children can safely draw or write on the vinyl chalkwall, survey their magic kingdoms or just sit and play. Outside, a trip to the sandbox for archaeological digs or a ride on one of the two sturdy belt swings provides plenty of fresh air activity. Adults will appreciate the high-quality, 100% premium wood construction and ease of assembly. Appleton is one small wonder that packs a big punch. For children aged 3 years to 7 years.
